entry.title: 🚨 Warning! Some people are getting this notification when connecting to @etherscan or @coingecko. DO NOT SIGN any transactions that you don't recog...
entry.summary: 🚨 Warning! Some people are getting this notification when connecting to @etherscan or @coingecko. DO NOT SIGN any transactions that you don't recognize, and keep an eye on this “NFT Apes Win” notification, don't interact with it! JLRoyal: 🚨 Careful with ETHERSCAN! 🚨 There is a pop up for "Nftapes win" that attempts to immediately connect to your wallet relentlessly! Careful out there #nft #nftcommunity
